panels.description: *Core Functionality - Critical & High importance test cases of Critical and High priority requirements.
panels.title: Core Functionality, 24-hour avg [$env]

panels.description: *Core Functionality - Critical & High importance test cases of Critical and High priority requirements
panels.title: Core Functionality, 7-day avg [$env]

panels.description: It's a historical representation of the 7-day overall avg. Data points represent the 7-day average at that respective time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, passed, xpass, skip, blocked, failed, xfailed, error, manual
FROM req_portal
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND env='prod' AND avg='overall-7' AND plugin='$plugin_name' ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Production overall 7-day avg historical data

panels.description: Make sure 7 days of data available

targets.rawSql:
SELECT l.total_tests - f.total_tests AS "New Tests", l.automated - f.automated AS "Automated", l.not_automated - f.not_automated AS "Non-Automated", l.manual_only - f.manual_only AS "Manual-Only" FROM 
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '7 days' ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) f,
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '7 days' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) l

panels.title: Last 7 Days

panels.description: Make sure 15 days of data available

targets.rawSql:
SELECT l.total_tests - f.total_tests AS "New Tests", l.automated - f.automated AS "Automated", l.not_automated - f.not_automated AS "Non-Automated", l.manual_only - f.manual_only AS "Manual-Only" FROM 
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '15 days' ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) f,
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '15 days' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) l

panels.title: Last 15 Days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", negative
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", missing_assignee, missing_automation_status, missing_component, missing_importance, missing_interface_type, missing_requirements, missing_type
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", customer_scenario
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT assignees
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
LIMIT 1

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT unittests.time AS "time",
unittests.other AS "unit-tests",
repositories.name
FROM unittests INNER JOIN repositories ON unittests.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT unittests.time AS "time",
unittests.other AS "unit-tests",
repositories.name
FROM unittests INNER JOIN repositories ON unittests.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", resolved, unresolved, rejected
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", resolved, unresolved, rejected
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", todo, blocked, in_progress, code_review, on_qa, release_pending

ORDER BY 1

ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", created_last_15d, created_last_30d

WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Created jira in last 15 and 30 days.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time AS "time", created_last_15d, created_last_30d
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1
